Package io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io.mod

Class ModInfoProvider

java.lang.Object
io.github.thecsdev.tcdcommons.api.util.io.mod.ModInfoProvider
public abstract class ModInfoProvider extends Object
A "wrapper" utility used by TCDCommons when obtaining information about currently installed mods.

    Method
    Description
    static final ModInfoProvider
    getInstance()
    Returns the current ModInfoProvider INSTANCE.
    abstract String[]
    getLoadedModIDs()
    Returns an array of mod "IDs" representing all currently installed mods.
    final Map<Character,Collection<String>>
    getLoadedModIDsGrouped()
    Similar to getLoadedModIDs(), but the mod IDs are grouped in a Map where the keys are alphabetically ordered characters.
    final Map<Character,Collection<String>>
    getLoadedModIDsGrouped(@Nullable Predicate<String> predicate)
    Same as getLoadedModIDsGrouped(), but with a Predicate allowing you to filter out any unwanted mods from the returned Map.
    abstract @Nullable ModInfo
    getModInfo(String modId)
    Returns the ModInfo object for a given currently installed mod, or null if no such mod is installed.

    • getModInfoS

      @Deprecated(forRemoval=true) @Nullable public static final @Nullable ModInfo getModInfoS(String modId) throws NullPointerException, IllegalStateException
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      A "static" method for getModInfo(String), so getInstance() doesn't have to be called every time.
      Parameters:
      modId - The unique "id" of the mod.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If getModInfo(String) throws it.
      IllegalStateException - If getInstance() returns null.

    • getModInfo

      @Nullable public abstract @Nullable ModInfo getModInfo(String modId) throws NullPointerException
      Returns the ModInfo object for a given currently installed mod, or null if no such mod is installed.
      Parameters:
      modId - The unique "id" of the mod.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the argument is null.

    • getLoadedModIDs

      public abstract String[] getLoadedModIDs()
      Returns an array of mod "IDs" representing all currently installed mods.

    • isModLoaded

      public boolean isModLoaded(String modId) throws NullPointerException
      Returns a Boolean indicating whether or not a specific mod is currently loaded.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • getLoadedModIDsGrouped

      public final Map<Character,Collection<String>> getLoadedModIDsGrouped()
      Similar to getLoadedModIDs(), but the mod IDs are grouped in a Map where the keys are alphabetically ordered characters.

    • getLoadedModIDsGrouped

      public final Map<Character,Collection<String>> getLoadedModIDsGrouped(@Nullable @Nullable Predicate<String> predicate)
      Same as getLoadedModIDsGrouped(), but with a Predicate allowing you to filter out any unwanted mods from the returned Map.
